articles.title: Leica's latest Q2 camera only shoots in black-and-white - Engadget
articles.description: Leica has unveiled the Q2 Monochrom, a version of its compact full-frame camera focused on black-and-white photography.
articles.content: Beyond that, you’ll see some very familiar elements. You’ll still see a 28mm f/1.7 prime lens (with digital zoom to replicate 35mm, 50mm and 75mm), a 3.68-megapixel OLED viewfinder and a 3-inch touch… [+472 chars]
